favourite.article: Behold, what manner of love! In His love toward us He made us His many sons. This love becomes our love toward Him and as we are perfected in this love, in expression we are made more to match the life within! We become those who have the inward reality and outward expression of the sons of God.
That sounds great! If it is much longer, it wound be wonderful!
It is a divine fact - we are the sons of God!
i am very blessed and it is my pleasure to know closer with the composer this song. I love this song very much. Hi Patricia Van Tine...God bless you according His richness and glory.
Thank you, it's so..beautiful. God Bless you always.
